page.title: 12Chorleywood - Local News
page.content: There are six different local papers which include Chorleywood within their area. The two main stories for the last week of June 1985 were:-Â£A decision on the abolition of Corporal Punishment in Hertfordshire schools will be made at Monday's meeting of the Education Committee'. Secondly, was a sad headline, Â£VILLAGE GARAGE OUT OF BUSINESS. Too many dealers and not enough customers were the reasons given for the sudden closure of a Chorleywood garage which had operated in the village for 30 years'. There are a lot of other interesting stories of local societies and people reported in the local papers, half of which are free and distributed throughout the village.
